sentences.en: But if they scuttle Mr Obama's nominee, he will simply name another.
sentences.cn: 但如果他们把奥巴马的候选名单刷下, 那奥巴马只是简单地换名字就可以了.

sentences.en: Elma was the nominee for Treasurer.
His nominee for vice president was elected only after a second ballot.
sentences.cn: 他提名的副总统在两轮投票后才当选。

sentences.en: I was delighted to be a nominee and to receive such a prestigious award in recognition of our company's achievements.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴获得提名，也很荣幸接受如此声誉卓越的奖项，这是对我们公司所取得成就的认可。

sentences.en: Mark is the nominee for Treasurer.
Mr. Francis is standing as the official nominee for the post of District Secretary.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯先生是行政书记职位的正式提名人.

sentences.en: Mr. Francisco is standing as the official nominee for the post of District Secretary.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯科先生是行政书记职位的正式提名人.

sentences.en: Occasionally, the Senate rejects a nominee.
sentences.cn: 参议院偶尔会否决被任命人.

sentences.en: Olivia Arthur is an English photographer, she is new nominee Magnum 2008.
sentences.cn: 奥利维娅·阿瑟是位英国的摄影师, 她是玛格南图片社2008年新提名成员.
民主党被提名的总统候选人

sentences.en: The Director is awaiting the Board's affirmation of his nominee.
sentences.cn: 董事长在等待董事会批准他提名的候选人.

sentences.en: The nominee has been confirmed in the Senate.
sentences.cn: 候选人已在参议院中确定.

sentences.en: The president was defending his nominee for the Supreme Court.
sentences.cn: 总统正在为最高法院与他的提名人辩论.

sentences.en: The presidential nominee was advised to choose a woman as a running mate.
sentences.cn: 有人建议总统候选人找一位女性竞选伙伴。

sentences.en: True or ultimate owner whose interest may be concealed by a nominee.
sentences.cn: 真正的或最终的所有人,他的权益也许会被任命者所掩盖.

sentences.en: We should work on a better method for choosing a presidential nominee.
sentences.cn: 我们应该找出一种更好的选举总统候选人的方法.

words.tran_cn: 主格的；记名的；被提名的
被任命者；被提名的人；代名人

trans.tran_cn: 被提名者，候选人，被任命者，代名人
trans.tran_en: someone who has been officially suggested for an important position, duty, or prize
